channel.title: Namyangju-si on Every Corner of Korea

item.title: A pilgrimage to Route 88 restaurant with family - Namyangju-si, Gyeonggi-do, Korea
item.description:
Paldang Lake scenery in May

A pilgrimage to Route 88 restaurant with family

Namyangju-si, Gyeonggi-do, Korea

God...

Starting from the southern end of the Paldang Bridge, the 45th National Road Drive Road, winding along the riverside to the left, is dazzling with fresh green. Light sunshine knocks on the car like a piano playing from the audio. When the riverside road ends, take the road on the left side of the Toma 3-way intersection, and National Highway 88 begins. It is a road leading to Toechon-myeon. The landscape of the river that has been resumed is the Gyeongan Lake, which is connected to the Paldang Lake. Crossing the bridge and entering the Toechon-myeon area, there is the first restaurant on Route 88.

Route 88 leads to the left from the intersection leading to the Tianjin Am Holy Land. This is the starting point of the ridge of Yangpyeong, where the small shopkeepers went to go to Gwangju's small market. This place, where the cows who had struggled over their heads were fed grass and the small intestines were resting their sore legs, was called 'Sommoegi'.
Born and raised in Toechon, Mr. Jeong Ji-soo produced a Korean restaurant that served as a side dish of Cheonggukjang and herbs cooked directly on the soil of Sommegigol inherited from his father. The name is ‘Sommegigi’ (031-767-9852).

A restaurant famous for the Cheonggukjang meal, Sommegi.
A restaurant famous for the Cheonggukjang meal, Sommegi.

“In spring, I have no mind to care for the herbs I bought from all over the country. In winter, my wrists are swollen and my wrists are swollen.”

This is a story from the owner who shows the herbs hanging from the main curtain next to the main restaurant. When I untie the string of the siraegi, the smell of the old time bursts out.

Herbs in the membrane
Mr. Jeong Ji-soo, the owner of dried rice bran
“I hang dried herbs on the booth across the valley, and the warehouse over there is full of jars that will last ten years. Gochujang, miso and pickles, I don't know how rich I am. ”
Even the person who listens to the pride of the owner is full. Let's go into the restaurant to taste the pride of the owner. Thick wooden tables and chairs are placed inside the ocher wall, which the owner's son personally decorated. I can feel the hospitality of a guest with a single flower of a grandmother placed on a plate. It would mean not just eating a bowl of rice and standing up, but also to enjoy the atmosphere and fashion of this house.
Mukmuchim and Dongdongju eat together with the flower

When I ordered Cheongguk Jang Hwang Tae-Gi, a cup of Dong Dong-Ju made of millet and pine needles, a salad of radish, and a salad came out. The soup is filled with the newly cooked stone cooked rice, plus the savory Cheonggukjang. In order to feel the unique scent, it is busy to put the chopsticks on the side dish without seasoning and the light pickles without salty taste. Above all, Cheonggukjang, where the beans are chewy, has a strong smell and is not salty.

Grilled Cheonggukjang Hwang Tae-gui
Cheonggukjang, strong and not salty

It's fun to see the dishes lined up for sale as an interior, and you can relax in the valley after a meal, so it's enough to enjoy the flavor of spring after a meal.

Valley where you can relax after meals
When you cross the Sommegi Pass, Route 88 continues toward Yangpyeong. Beyond the ridge, there is a restaurant called “Lato Marte” (031-767-0558), which air-fires Italian ash and bakes pizza in a homemade oven. This restaurant is said to say, "If you taste the pizza in this house, you will never eat the pizza in the franchise restaurant."
Italian restaurant “La Tomate”
The story of the birth of this pizza is the first topping that adds to the taste.
Kwon Soon-jo and Sung-suk Kwon, who worked at a multinational corporation's Washington branch, enjoyed visiting an Italian restaurant near Washington. After returning home, Kwon Soon-jo replaced lunch with a sandwich lunch box that his wife made, and he said that the sandwich lunch box was popular with colleagues.
Inside the 'Lato Marte', which is decorated with a cute look

A man who was an executive of a multinational company with a high salary, untie his tie one day and decide to retire early. This is why I was not happy. The wife was happy to agree.
“I had no idea at first. I traveled to the mountains to meet. I really hated shaving and haircuts while I was at work, but I also liked my beard and hair. I even raised my hair to the waist. ”
The couple, who traveled and arranged a house in Toechon, opened a pizza restaurant with the intention of sharing with neighbors. The good-looking wife was in charge of spaghetti. This created a restaurant run by two people without a single employee. It was 10 years ago.

Baking pizza in a homemade oven
Pizza baked in the oven
“I never went to learn how to make pizza or anything like that. I love pizza and bread, so when I retire later, I have to do bakery, and I had such vague hope. ”
The success of his son in the United States has identified Italy's best food supply route. After several experiments and failures depending on his taste, the right pizza began to be baked.
At the same time as the order, my husband, Mr. Kwon Soon-jo, is in charge of the entire process of burning wood fires in the oven and preparing toppings and baking in the meantime. Bake the savory bread yourself. Mr. Yoo Sung-suk is in charge of salad, spaghetti, dessert, and serving.
Good beef pizza for children
Carbonara spaghetti with savory taste
Garlic Pizza with a unique flavor

Are you curious about the taste of pizza?
“Do you like pizza? I don't know that. It was just a kiss for my couple. What anyone can say with confidence is that they never use harmful ingredients. Pizza is called fast food, but it is not. It's really good for your body if you make it right. ”

This is the story of his wife, Sung-sook Cho. The reason for making your own ice cream for customers who make reservations in advance is because it takes time to prepare.

Homemade ice cream with walnuts and ginger
On a holiday afternoon, invite yourself to a friend's home with a good food and imagine eating and enjoying. In the yard, the children are running around and the savory smell of pizza is filled in the house. The idea came to mind when picking up a slice of crispy pizza from Latomate.
The owner and wife of Latomate
Travel information

Restaurants near
-Sommegi: Cheonggukjangsik / 580-3 Jeongyeong-ro, Toechon-myeon, Gwangju-si, Gyeonggi-do / 031-767-9852
-Lato Mate: Pizza, Spaghetti / 941-9 Jeongyeong-ro, Toechon-myeon, Gwangju-si, Gyeonggi-do / 031-767-0558


Rooms

-Jeonjeong Pension: 38, Galol-gil 11beon-gil, Toechon-myeon, Gwangju-si, Gyeonggi-do / 031-768-3917

http://www.jo-pension.co.kr/

-Hanok Village, Gwangju, Gyeonggi: 39, Saeogae-gil, Gwangju-si, Gyeonggi-do / 031-766-9677

http://www.경기광주한옥마을.kr/



※ The above information was updated in May 2019, and may be changed later, so please check before you travel.

item.title: Three seasons of delicious ssambap in Gyeonggi-do. - Namyangju-si, Gyeonggi-do, Korea
item.description:
'Leaf Bird' ssambap with barley bibimbap and red pepper paste

Three seasons of delicious ssambap in Gyeonggi-do.

Namyangju-si, Gyeonggi-do, Korea

If you want to find the taste that you lost in April when spring energy is full, crispy and refreshing ssambap is the best. There is no such thing as a fresh ssam vegetable with a taste that has only been picked up. After eating plenty of protein and vitamin ssambap and sleeping sweetly, the heavy body wakes up.
If you go to Anyang, Namyangju, and Ilsan in the suburbs of Seoul, there are many fresh and delicious ssambap restaurants. On a sunny spring day, I visited three ssambap restaurants in Ilseoksamjo where you can climb, watch flowers and eat delicious ssambap.
'Ssam Thief' ssambap with lotus leaf duck and ssamjang
Namyangju ‘Mokhyangwon’ with fresh air and delicious ssam rice
Even after about an hour away from Seoul, the air is different and the vision is different. When you enter Namyangju, Gyeonggi-do, you will find Mokhyangwon at the end of the road beyond Deokneung Pass and into Heungkuksa Temple. I wonder if there will be a ssambap restaurant in this remote place. The three rustic thatched houses, the janggok in the pot, the small pond decorated with wood, and the splendid sperm seem to come to the country house.
Three thatched houses are Mokhyangwon's restaurants
Three thatched houses accommodating up to 200 people are always full at lunchtime, so you must get a waiting ticket at the entrance. Walking slowly through the cozy park, the average waiting time is 30 minutes. There are many visitors climbing and descending the mountains of Suseong and Buam, and it is even more crowded from March to October.
Mokhyangwon's interior with outdoor view from a large glass window
When you enter the restaurant, the fragrant charcoal bulgogi stimulates your appetite. In the back of the restaurant, there is a staff who grills only bulgogi on charcoal all day. The grill on pork charcoal fired on top of a good charcoal fire is rotated 23 times, and it is grilled sharply. The carefully grilled pork bulgogi is placed on a hot plate and served on a guest table. The pork bulgogi is good because it's hot.
Grilled meat grilled over charcoal at the same time as order
The ssam vegetables that are farmed and delivered directly from the Yangpyeong Dumulmeori organic complex are reliable because the worm-eaten holes are sore. Infinite refills of seven ssam vegetables, including Dacheongchae, Cheongromain, red mustard, kale, red beetroot, lettuce, and red rose main. The kimchi that is made every day is fresh, and the miso stew stewed with the soybean paste soaked in the mouth contains the savory taste of a rural grandmother. The softly fried Siraegi is more delicious because it's from Andong, and the ssamjang with scoop is chewy and the dish is wrapped in a chewy taste. The most eye-catching thing on the table is the black rice, rice, and rice on the plate. Even though the quantity is quite large, I cannot give up either yellow rice with a good taste or black rice with soft taste or soft rice.
Grilled bulgogi ssambap set at Mokhyangwon
Business hours from 11:00 to 21:15, grilled bulgogi ssambap set meal 15,000 won, pajeon 15,000 won.
Urun ssamjang made with homemade soybean paste
Ssambap with seasonal side dishes, Anyang “Ssam Thief”
If a hiker climbs to Gwanak Mountain and descends to Anyang, there is a house to visit without forgetting. It is a famous ssam thief with ssam rice filled with wildflowers that the owner has grown as a hobby for 10 years. A large placard at the entrance of the restaurant stands out. Environmental burden 2,000 won. It is a fine that customers who pay a side dish must pay. When you step inside the restaurant, you know why. At one side of the restaurant, there are more than 10 kinds of ssam vegetables that change according to season, such as romaine lettuce, cabbage, kale, red pepper curry, green mustard, red mustard, dachungchae, red lettuce, celery, and Angelica. Next to it, there are cool white kimchi, green bean sprouts, deodeokjangchi, wooji jijim, mulberry sprouts, lotus root salad, burdock pickles, sheepskin and seed ssamjang. Eight kinds of side dishes are charming without missing any one, so if you greedyly eat them, you usually forget your meal. It is important not to forget the environmental burden while eating.
Steamed lotus leaf duck and grilled mackerel
Ssam Thief's popular menus include Onggi boiled pork, roasted mackerel and grilled mackerel. The savory stir-fried pork marinated with fresh fruit and steamed lotus leaf duck over leek are the best menu for ssambap. The spicy stir-fried pork or plain duck meat is placed on the ssam, and the nutty ssamjang with plenty of sunflower seeds, peanuts, and pumpkin seeds is a savory taste. Norwegian mackerel is delicious in the oven, moistly baked and placed on ssam, and soft to eat.
Grilled sweet mackerel is moist and soft
Another virtue of Ssam Thief is that you can go and eat alone. Onggi boil, which comes with stir-fried pork, is only available, but it is good news for those who want to eat ssambap alone. The lunch and dinner prices are the same, so it's also economical for evening gatherings. After eating and going down to the first floor, you can drink coffee from a professional barista, so you don't have to go to a cafe in the distance. It is a rice restaurant of ssambap, coffee, wildflowers, and ilseok samjo.
Stir-fried meat with mackerel grilled on top of Onggi boil
Business Hours 11: 00 ~ 21: 30, stir-fried meat, grilled mackerel 14,000 won, burdock bulgogi, grilled mackerel 20,000 won
Crispy Chinese cabbage, savory mackerel and ssamjang go well together
Ssambab, Goyang 'Leaf Bird'
Around Pungdong Pungsan Station, Ilsandong-gu, Goyang-si, it is famous for a food street called Anygol. If you go straight about 300m from the entrance of Anygol, you can see the ssambap, the leaf bird, on the right. When entering the restaurant, the interior is fresh, decorated like an exotic pasta house rather than a Korean restaurant.
The interior is more like a restaurant than a ssambap restaurant
When you order ssambap, there is a wide variety of side dishes as well as ssam vegetables that come out generously. The leaves, which opened in 2001 in Ilsan, where there are exceptionally many ssambap restaurants, have long run as ssambap shops for 18 years, have many old classics. The interior is large enough to accommodate over 100 seats, but the atmosphere is long even on weekdays. From March to October, it is always crowded with guests from all over the country. Especially at Goyang International Flower Fair, it is more crowded with customers who come to see flowers. Avoiding mealtime is another way to reduce waiting time.
Table top with red pepper paste samgyeopsal on ssambap set meal
If you order the ssambap set meal, fusion side dishes are rich in addition to salad, tofu kimchi, kimchi jeon, japchae, tangpyeongchae, jellyfish seasoning, and uncooled radish. Fresh barley rice is served in a neat bebo porcelain, and fresh ssam vegetables are full on the plate. Bean sprouts, ferns, spinach, shiitake mushrooms, and other herbs for bibimbap are also severely seasoned. If you put red pepper paste and perilla oil and rub it, wrap it in lettuce or Chinese cabbage. There are only 16 types of ssam, and they are changed to various ssam vegetables depending on the season.
Barley rice and ssam vegetables from ssambap set meal
If you don't have the red pepper paste grilled on the charcoal, seasoned with red pepper paste, you can add it. The grilled pork belly with a little greasy taste goes well with ssambap. The miso soup stewed with potatoes and thickly boiled is perfect for ssambap. It's a cozy and comfortable atmosphere, so it's okay to settle for a cup of coffee on the spot after a meal, unless it's a complicated lunch break.
There are sixteen kinds of ssam vegetables in ssambap set meal.
Business Hours 11: 00 ~ 20: 30, Natural Table 29,000 won, Sanchae Bibimbap Ssam 13,000 won, Old Bulgogi Ssambap 19,000 won
Grilled red pepper paste with a greasy, spicy taste
Travel information

Mok Hyang Won
Address: 34-12, Deokneung-ro 1071beon-gil, Namyangju-si, Gyeonggi-do
Contact: 031-527-2255

Scam thief
Address: 67 Sammak-ro, Manan-gu, Anyang-si, Gyeonggi-do
Contact: 031-471-7676

Leaves
Address: 112 Anygol-gil, Ilsandong-gu, Goyang-si, Gyeonggi-do
Contact: 031-904-3356

http://www.ipsse.co.kr/default/

1. Nearby destinations

Fraum Musical Instrument Museum: 756, Gyeonggang-ro, Wabu-eup, Namyangju-si / 031-521-6043
Surisan Byeongmok An Citizen's Park: San 81-1, Anyang 9-dong, Manan-gu, Anyang-si / 031-8045-5552
Goyang International Flower Expo: Ilsan Lake Park, 595, Lake-ro, Ilsandong-gu, Goyang / 031-908-7750

2.Accommodation

Country Motel: 1525-32 Bukhangang-ro, Hwado-eup, Namyangju-si / 031-595-1566
Mirabell Hotel: 1056 Jungang-ro, Ilsandong-gu, Goyang-si / 031-901-2333
Valentine Hotel: 8-24, Ilhyeon-ro 41beon-gil, Ilsanseo-gu, Goyang-si / 031-919-2205
